msg.msgText: The configuration of composite objects that control messaging services, such as MessageHub, Endpoint, Queue etc., can be updated using the "imaserver update" command. SYNTAX: imaserver update help imaserver update object_type help imaserver update object_type "Name=value" "Item=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver update Endpoint "Name=TestEP" "Port=23456"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
